summary.span: 提供一个用于在 XHTML 标记中呈现移动控件的默认控件适配器。

span.span: Provides a default control adapter for rendering mobile controls in XHTML markup.

summary.span: 有关如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用程序的信息，请参阅 [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) 网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供呈现控件和每个子代的移动设备 XHTML 标记中的基移动控件适配器。This class provides a base mobile control adapter that renders a control and each of its children in XHTML markup for mobile devices. 它还为派生 XHTML 移动控件适配器提供帮助器方法和公共属性。It also provides helper methods and common properties for derived XHTML mobile control adapters. 控件适配器是可重写某些组件类方法和事件，以允许浏览器或标记特定的处理。Control adapters are components that override certain class methods and events to allow browser-specific or markup-specific handling. 在呈现行为适应性大部分封装在类。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior is encapsulated in the class. 如果你正在考虑是否要生成你自己的控件适配器，请记住，一个适配器可以用于重写大量的浏览器类行为。If you are considering whether to build your own control adapter, keep in mind that a single adapter can be used to override a number of browser class behaviors. 或者，通过在从派生的类中包含所需的适应性类，你可能无需使用控件适配器。Alternatively, by including the desired adaptability in a class derived from the class, you might eliminate the need to use a control adapter. 特定的控件类的适配器适用于从该类，继承的所有控件，除非存在更专业的适配器。An adapter for a specific control class applies to all controls that inherit from that class, unless more specialized adapters are present. 例如，类用于验证的设备的要求或可以显示 XHTML 标记的所有移动控件。For example, the class is used to validate all mobile controls for devices that require or can display XHTML markup. 在处理期间，.NET Framework 截获对特定于当前目标控件的方法的调用。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that are specific to the current target. 如果与控件关联的控件适配器，.NET Framework 调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is associated with the control, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 控件的某些属性控制跨多个辅助页为移动设备上的显示方式。Some properties of a control govern the way it displays across multiple secondary pages for a mobile device. 这些页统称为*辅助 UI*。These page are collectively known as *secondary UI*. 属性可以用于定义将显示哪一页。The property can be used to define which page will be displayed. 方法可以用于删除任何辅助的 UI 设置。The method can be used to remove any secondary UI settings.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

para.span: 继承自类，为给定的控件类型和标记语言模式中将你的适配器 (例如， )。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, name your adapter for a given control type and markup language in the pattern (for example, ).

para.span: 应在中实现提供 XHTML 标记的控件的适配器命名空间。

span.span: Adapters for a control that provides XHTML markup should be implemented in the namespace.

para.span: 应为每个配置.browser 文件中的设备节点下专用控件定义任何专用的适配器。

span.span: Any specialized adapters should be defined for the specialized control under each of the device nodes in the configuration .browser files.

para.span: 正确实现的控件不应假定附加了适配器，或附加的适配器实现特定接口。

span.span: A properly implemented control should not assume that an adapter is attached, or that the attached adapter implements a specific interface.

para.span: 相反，它应检查这些条件。

span.span: Instead, it should check for these conditions.

para.span: 大量的条件的呈现方法允许为此类情况作为辅助 UI 和需要换行符后的每个块或每个内联控件的显示设备的。

span.span: A number of conditional rendering methods allow for such conditions as secondary UI and for display devices that require line breaks after every block or after every inline control.

para.span: 这些条件方法的示例包括和。

span.span: Examples of these conditional methods are and .

para.span: 这些方法都适用于给定设备而不考虑所呈现的控件。

span.span: These methods work for a given device regardless of the control being rendered.

para.span: 不太可能需要创建基于此类的新控件适配器时，重写这些方法。

span.span: It is unlikely you would need to override these methods when creating a new control adapter based on this class.

para.span: 至少，你将需要重写方法。

span.span: At a minimum, you would need to override the methods.

para.span: 设备筛选需要的服务器控件使用一个特定的适配器。

span.span: Device filtering is required to use a specific adapter for a server control.

para.span: 有关设备筛选的详细信息，请参阅[体系结构概述的自适应控件行为](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)和[设备筛选概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。

span.span: For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).

## Remarks 如果目标设备需要块级别元素上的分页符如`
`，通过指定的文本编写器`writer`呈现了元素，开始时设置挂起的分行符，并自动呈现一个符 (`
`) 末尾的元素。If the target device requires breaks on block-level elements such as `
`, the text writer specified by `writer` sets a pending break when starting to render the element, and automatically renders a break (`
`) at the end of the element. 如果元素的内容超出在设备上的一个逻辑页，则适配器会清除页末尾挂起的分行符。If the content of the element extends beyond one logical page on the device, the adapter clears the pending break at the end of the page. 此方法主要用于在.NET framework 内部。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来减少到其基本参数的查询字符串，方法是删除以下信息：Use this method to reduce the query string to its basic parameters by removing the following information: - 文件名称和路径信息。The file name and path information. - 参数指定当前。A parameter specifying the current . - 参数名为"x-向上-descharset"，它指定当前的字符集。A parameter named "x-up-descharset", which specifies the current character set. 页适配器使用返回的查询字符串来创建对象来访问剩余的参数和它们的值。The page adapter uses the returned query string to create a object to access the remaining parameters and their values. 此方法主要用于在.NET framework 内部。This method is primarily used by the .NET Framework internally.

para.span: 基实现将保存在视图状态中的当前辅助 UI 模式。

span.span: The base implementation of saves the current secondary UI mode in view state.

para.span: 可以重写它以保存的视图状态中的其他特定数据，但请务必从基类，获取当前状态，然后将其与结合特定于控件的状态以保持跨请求的辅助 UI 模式。

span.span: You can override it to save other specific data from view state, but be sure to obtain the current state from the base class, and then combine it with your control-specific state in order to preserve the secondary UI mode across requests.

para.span: 有关管理视图状态的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示用户界面的附加屏幕的控件使用辅助用户界面。Secondary UI is used by controls that show additional screens of a user interface. 若要使用辅助用户界面，控件适配器，请执行以下步骤：To use secondary UI, a control adapter performs the following steps: 1. 期间的回发事件，控件适配器设置中的属性基类。During a postback event, the control adapter sets the property in the base class. 2. 在呈现时，该控件检查辅助的用户界面模式，并呈现相应的辅助 UI。In rendering, the control checks the secondary UI mode, and renders the appropriate secondary UI. 3. 在响应与辅助 UI 的用户交互，控件适配器可能会将辅助的用户界面模式更改为另一个值，或通过调用退出辅助用户界面模式方法。In response to user interaction with the secondary UI, the control adapter might change the secondary UI mode to another value, or exit secondary UI mode by calling the method. 此属性主要由自定义适配器的开发人员使用。This property is primarily used by developers of custom adapters.
